summary: The customer was having trouble understanding how to make a payment for Contoso Wireless' internet service. The agent was able to help the customer make a payment with their credit card by obtaining the card number, expiration date, and security code. The agent also informed the customer about Contoso Wireless' introductory plan that includes two months of free service with no installation fees or equipment costs when you sign up for a one-year contract. The customer was pleased with this offer and the agent provided instructions on how to sign up.
